service.planet: Service provided by Norway’s International Climate & Forests Initiative

system_coordinator.sirgas2000: SIRGAS 2000 reference surface, Geographic Coordinate System (in degrees)

region.brasil: The entire national territory of Brazil
region.cerrado: Cerrado Biome, allowing to analyze the classes of land use by other regions of interest such as: states and municipalities.

fonte.lapig: Laboratory of Image Processing and Geoprocessing - LAPIG.

metadata.title: Agricultura - Agrosatélite
metadata.description: Dynamics of expanding the area planted with annual crops in the Cerrado Biome.
metadata.region: Cerrado Biome, allowing to analyze the classes of land use by other regions of interest such as: states and municipalities.
metadata.fonte: Agrosatélite Applied Geotechnology, Gordon and Betty Moore Foundation (funders)

metadata.title: Satellite images: Planet
metadata.description: With hundreds of satellites in orbit, Planet is able to obtain images with a resolution of 3 meters of any location on Earth daily.

metadata.title: Satellite images: SENTINEL
metadata.description: The global and cloudless Sentinel-2 map, crafted by EOX.

metadata.title: Rural Property
metadata.description: Properties registered in the Rural Environmental Registry (CAR) - Law No. 12,651, of May 25, 2012.
metadata.fonte: Rural Environmental Registry (CAR) / Brazilian Forest Service (SFB)

metadata.title: Water Planning
metadata.description: The water planning unit intends to support the definition of the minimum coverage area for the development of a plan, considered as a need to integrate the National Policy with State and Municipal Policies.

metadata.title: Indigenous Land (TI)
metadata.description: Indigenous lands boundaries.

metadata.title: Settlements
metadata.description: The agrarian reform settlement is a group of agricultural units, installed by Incra in a rural property.
metadata.fonte: The National Institute of Colonization and Agrarian Reform (INCRA)

metadata.title: Quilombolas Communities
metadata.description: Boundaries of Quilombolas Communities lands.

metadata.title: Conservation Units (Integral Protection)
metadata.description: Location of strictly protected conservation units.
metadata.fonte: Chico Mendes Institute for Biodiversity Conservation (ICMBio)

metadata.title: Conservation Units (Sustainable Use)
metadata.description: Location of sustainable use conservation units.
metadata.fonte: Chico Mendes Institute for Biodiversity Conservation (ICMBio)

metadata.title: Mapa de Argila no Solo - SoilGrids
metadata.description: SoilGrids is a 250m scale global mapping system that uses 150,000 soil profiles and Machine Learning to predict different quantitative properties of the soil such as: clay, sand, organic carbon density, organic carbon stock, organic carbon in the soil and total nitrogen. With depths of 0, 5, 15, 30, 60, 100 and 200 centimeters. Proportion of clay particles (less than 0.002 mm) in g / kg.
metadata.region: Cerrado Biome, allowing to analyze the classes of land use by other regions of interest such as: states and municipalities.

metadata.title: Default Value
metadata.description: Default Description

metadata.title: Pasture Areas of Brazil
metadata.description: Annual mapping of Brazilian pastures, carried out using Landsat data series from 1985 to 2020. Using supervised classification approaches (Random Forest) from Google's Earth Engine platform.
metadata.fonte: Laboratory of Image Processing and Geoprocessing - Lapig (data generation). Annual Land Use and Land Cover Mapping Project in Brazil - MapBiomas (funder).

metadata.title: Evidence of degradation of Brazilian pastures
metadata.description: Mapping of pasture quality generated by Lapig, where data from pastures were analyzed pixel by pixel for the period from 2011 to 2016, through analysis of trends in accumulated anomalies. The analysis was based on satellite data (NDVI / MOD13Q1), through losses or gains in productivity assessment. Areas with a significant tendency to lost productivity (p <0.05) were considered areas with evidence of degradation.
metadata.fonte: Laboratory of Image Processing and Geoprocessing - Lapig (data generation). Annual Land Use and Land Cover Mapping Project in Brazil - MapBiomas (funder).

metadata.title: Bovine Herd in Animal Units (UA)
metadata.description: Calculation performed considering the composition of the herd for the agricultural census. For the years 1986 to 1999, data from the 1996 agricultural census were used. For the years 2000 to 2018, data from the 2006 agricultural census were used. Animal Unit (UA) is equivalent to 450 kg animal alive.

metadata.title: Carbon Stock with Living Biomass Index
metadata.description: Estimates of stocks in pasture areas of the Cerrado biome, in the following compartments: (a) live aboveground biomass; (b) dead aboveground biomass; (c) soil organic matter; and (d) roots.

metadata.title: Dead Biomass Carbon Stock
metadata.description: Estimates of stocks in pasture areas of the Cerrado biome, in the following compartments: (a) live aboveground biomass; (b) dead aboveground biomass; (c) soil organic matter; and (d) roots.

metadata.title: Soil Organic Material Carbon Stock (SOM)
metadata.description: Estimates of stocks in pasture areas of the Cerrado biome, in the following compartments: (a) live aboveground biomass; (b) dead aboveground biomass; (c) soil organic matter; and (d) roots.

metadata.title: Roots Carbon Stock
metadata.description: Estimates of stocks in pasture areas of the Cerrado biome, in the following compartments: (a) live aboveground biomass; (b) dead aboveground biomass; (c) soil organic matter; and (d) roots.

metadata.title: Field Points with Stop
metadata.description: Aiming to validate maps produced by LAPIG-UFG within the scope of MapBiomas and to subsidize research in order to qualifying Brazilian pasturelands, six field activities were carried out during the years 2017 and 2018. A large set of georeferenced points was formed and organized with data on land use / land cover and indicative of pasturelands quality.

metadata.title: Field points Non Stop
metadata.description: Aiming to validate maps produced by LAPIG-UFG within the scope of MapBiomas and to subsidize research in order to qualifying Brazilian pastures, six field activities were carried out during the years 2017 and 2018. A large set of georeferenced points was formed and organized with data on land use / cover and indicative of pasture quality.

metadata.title: Visually Inspected Points
metadata.description: Georeferenced set of points for the entire Brazilian territory, with classes of Land use and land cover referring to each year, from 1985 to 2017. Landsat images from TM, ETM + and OLI sensors were used. We also sought to address the criteria adopted, difficulties and specificities encountered regarding the interpretation of images in each of the 6 Brazilian biomes.

metadata.title: Visually Inspected Points
metadata.description: Georeferenced set of points for the entire Brazilian territory, with classes of Land use and land cover referring to each year, from 1985 to 2017. Landsat images from TM, ETM + and OLI sensors were used. We also sought to address the criteria adopted, difficulties and specificities encountered regarding the interpretation of images in each of the 6 Brazilian biomes.

metadata.title: Visually Inspected Points
metadata.description: Georeferenced set of points for the entire Brazilian territory, with classes of Land use and land cover referring to each year, from 1985 to 2017. Landsat images from TM, ETM + and OLI sensors were used. We also sought to address the criteria adopted, difficulties and specificities encountered regarding the interpretation of images in each of the 6 Brazilian biomes.

metadata.title: Visually Inspected Points
metadata.description: Georeferenced set of points for the entire Brazilian territory, being assigned pasture and non-grazing classes referring to the year 2020. Semiannual Sentinel 2 images were used through the GEE platform and using the Qgis software.

metadata.title: Planted Forest (MapBiomas Collection 6)
metadata.description: Tree species planted for commercial purposes (e.g., pine, eucalyptus, araucaria).

metadata.title: Perennial Crop (MapBiomas Collection 6)
metadata.description: Areas occupied with short or medium term agricultural crops (e.g., Soybean, Sugarcane, Rice, and others).

metadata.title: Temporary Crop (MapBiomas Collection 6)
metadata.description: Areas occupied with agricultural crops with a long vegetative cycle (e.g, Coffee, Citrus, Cocoa, Cashew, and others).

municipios_info.viewValueType: Municipalities of Brazil with Biomes and States
